#labels Phase-Support,Phase-Implementation
# fbx2xfile to be available within three weeks.

= Introduction =

The source code of version 1.0 will be available about three weeks later.

= Details =

The functions of version 1.0 will include:

  * support converting of 3d model.
  * support converting of 3d skeletal animtion.
  * support converting of 3d textures.
  * support scaling of 3d models.
  * support changing of up direction of axis.
